title: Implement 4 Share API endpoints and integration tests
description: Complete the Share API implementation by adding 4 missing endpoints: list shares, get share by token, and their corresponding integration tests. Currently 5 tests pass (create/delete functionality), but 4 tests are skipped for unimplemented endpoints. This is feature-dependent and not blocking current functionality.
close_reason: Endpoints ARE implemented in app/api/sharing.py. Issue was misleading - tests just use wrong URLs. Created CookingAssistant-6oj for test URL fixes.

title: Fix backend Share API test URLs (4 tests)
description: Update 4 skipped tests in test_sharing_api.py to use correct endpoint URLs. Tests expect /api/v1/shares but actual is /api/v1/shares/my-shares, etc.
close_reason: Fixed 4 test URLs to match actual endpoints. All 154 backend tests now passing.

close_reason: Updated tests for select dropdown and button text changes. All 39 RecipeForm tests now passing.

title: Add frontend E2E user flow tests
description: Optional: Implement approximately 5 frontend E2E tests using Playwright for end-to-end user flows. Current page tests (93 tests, 100% passing) provide sufficient journey coverage. E2E tests would verify full UI/API integration. Deferred as optional enhancement for future iteration.
close_reason: Already complete: 11 E2E test files exist in e2e/tests/ covering auth, recipes, errors, and workflows

title: Fix 4 AuthContext integration tests with async/MSW timing issues
description: 4 AuthContext integration tests are currently skipped due to complex async state updates with MSW timing synchronization. Tests affected: login success, register success, logout flow, and load user from stored token. The underlying API functions work correctly, but test assertions fail due to timing. Low production impact but should be investigated for test suite completeness.
close_reason: Fixed property name mismatch in test component. Changed 'currentUser' to 'user' to match actual AuthContext interface. All 4 tests now passing (7/7 total, 100%).

title: Fix LoginPage tests (10 failures)
description: Update tests to match component changes: button text changed from Sign In/Sign Up to Login/Register, added name attributes to inputs.
close_reason: Updated test assertions to match new button text. All 20 LoginPage tests now passing.

title: Update CI/CD workflow to enforce test passing
description: Remove 'continue-on-error' flag from frontend test step in .github/workflows/frontend-ci.yml. Currently tests run but failures don't block the pipeline. This is high priority for production deployment to ensure all tests must pass before merging. All tests are now passing (348/352, 98.9% pass rate) so this is safe to enable.
close_reason: Frontend CI workflow already has continue-on-error flag removed in commit 037c534 (Jan 5, 2026). Tests now properly enforce passing before merge.

title: Add backend E2E user journey tests
description: Optional: Implement approximately 10 backend E2E tests covering complete user journeys (registration → login → create recipe → update → delete → logout flows). Current coverage is comprehensive with 147 unit+integration tests at 78% coverage. E2E tests would provide marginal additional value. Deferred as optional enhancement.
